contexts.context: ...like stars or the messages of stars. Ayem took a <mark>netchiman's</mark> wife and said:
Then Ayem threw the <mark>netchiman's</mark> wife into the ocean water where dreughs took her into castles...
...her into castles of glass and coral. They gifted the <mark>netchiman's</mark> wife with gills and milk fingers, changing her sex so...
Then Seht came to the <mark>netchiman's</mark> wife and said:
...a glimmering rope through the water, and they raised the <mark>netchiman's</mark> wife back to the surface world and set her down on...
To which the <mark>netchiman's</mark> wife said to the Hortator.
